```{r }

library(enaR)
library(bipartite)
source('../src/enaPlot.R')

```


```{r }

data(enaModels)
data(enaModelInfo)
enaModels <- enaModels[enaModelInfo$type == 'TRO']
n.dead <- lapply(enaModels,function(x) sum(abs(sign(unpack(x)$living)-1)))
enaBP <- enaModels[names(enaModels) == names(unlist(n.dead[n.dead == max(unlist(n.dead))]))[1]][[1]]
enaBP <- as.bipartite(enaBP,abs(sign(unpack(enaBP)$'living')-1))
plotweb(t(enaBP))

names(enaModels)
n <- unlist(lapply(enaModels,function(x) nrow(unpack(x)$F)))
enaSmall <- enaModels[n < 33]

pdf(file='../data/enaPlotExample.pdf',width=12,height=12)
par(mfrow=c(6,6),bg='black')
lapply(enaSmall,enaPlot,v.col='lightblue',e.col='white',extended=T)
dev.off()
system('open ../data/enaPlotExample.pdf')

```
